entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
